text: Always be yourself, express yourself, have faith in yourself, do not go out and look for a successful personality and duplicate it.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Art reaches its greatest peak when devoid of self-consciousness. Freedom discovers man the moment he loses concern over what impression he is making or about to make.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Always be yourself and have faith in yourself. Do not go out and look for a successful personality and try to duplicate it.
author: Bruce Lee

text: If you always put limit on everything you do, physical or anything else. It will spread into your work and into your life. There are no limits. There are only plateaus, and you must not stay there, you must go beyond them.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Absorb what is useful. Discard what is not. Add what is uniquely your own.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Showing off is the fool's idea of glory.
author: Bruce Lee

text: A fight is not won by one punch or kick. Either learn to endure or hire a bodyguard.
author: Bruce Lee

text: I fear not the man who has practiced 10,000 kicks once, but I fear the man who has practiced one kick 10,000 times
author: Bruce Lee

text: If you want to learn to swim jump into the water. On dry land no frame of mind is ever going to help you.
author: Bruce Lee

text: I'm not in this world to live up to your expectations and you're not in this world to live up to mine.
author: Bruce Lee

text: I did what I came here to do. What I've done I've done with sincerity and to the best of my ability. You can't expect much more from life.
author: Bruce Lee

text: It is not a daily increase, but a daily decrease. Hack away at the inessentials.
author: Bruce Lee

text: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
author: Bruce Lee

text: If you always put limits on everything you do, physical or anything else, it will spread into your work and into your life. There are no limits. There are only plateaus, and you must not stay there, you must go beyond them.
author: Bruce Lee

text: If I should die tomorrow, I will have no regrets. I did what I wanted to do. You can't expect more from life.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Notice that the stiffest tree is most easily cracked, while the bamboo or willow survives by bending with the wind.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Simplicity is the key to brilliance.
author: Bruce Lee

text: If you spend too much time thinking about a thing, you'll never get it done.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Give recognition where it is due. Compliments stimulate more effort and desire to improve. Be generous with honest praising.
author: Bruce Lee

text: All fixed set patterns are incapable of adaptability or pliability. The truth is outside of all fixed patterns.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Don't pray for an easy life, pray for the strength to endure a difficult one.
author: Bruce Lee

text: It's not the daily increase but daily decrease. Hack away at the unessential.
author: Bruce Lee

text: The less effort, the faster and more powerful you will be.
author: Bruce Lee

text: The key to immortality is first living a life worth remembering
author: Bruce Lee

text: Do not pray for an easy life, pray for the strength to endure a difficult one.
author: Bruce Lee

text: I fear not the man who has practiced 10,000 kicks once, but I fear the man who has practiced one kick 10,000 times.
author: Bruce Lee

text: I don't stop when I'm tired i stop when I'm done.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Balance your thoughts with action. If you spend too much time thinking about a thing, you'll never get it done.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Genius: The capacity to see and to express what is simple, simply!
author: Bruce Lee

text: Real living is living for others.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Be a calm beholder of what is happening around you.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Love is like a friendship caught on fire. In the beginning a flame, very pretty, often hot and fierce, but still only light and flickering. As love grows older, our hearts mature and our love becomes as coals, deep-burning and unquenchable.
author: Bruce Lee

text: After all, all knowledge simply means self knowledge.
author: Bruce Lee

text: A quick temper will make a fool of you soon enough.
author: Bruce Lee

text: All martial arts is simply an honest expression of one's body with a lot of deception in between.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Use only that which works, and take it from any place you can find it.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Remember you are expressing the technique, not doing the technique.
author: Bruce Lee

text: A martial artist has to take responsibility for himself and accept the consequences of his own doing.
author: Bruce Lee

text: To me, the extraordinary aspect of martial arts lies in its simplicity. The easy way is also the right way, and martial arts is nothing at all special; the closer to the true way of martial arts, the less wastage of expression there is.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Martial arts, like any art, is an unrestricted athletic expression of an individual soul.
author: Bruce Lee

text: A good martial artist does not become tend but ready, not thinking but jet not dreaming. Ready for whatever may come.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Absorb what is useful, Discard what is not, Add what is uniquely your own.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Empty your mind, be formless, shapeless like water.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Always be yourself, express yourself have faith in yourself, do not go out and look for a successful personality and duplicate it.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Defeat is a state of mind; no one is ever defeated until defeat has been accepted as a reality.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Don't fear failure. Not failure, but low aim, is the crime. In great attempts it is glorious even to fail.
author: Bruce Lee

text: If you love naps, don't waste naps, for naps are what life is made of.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Conditioning obstructs our view of reality. We do not see IT in its suchness because of our indoctrination, crooked and twisted.
author: Bruce Lee

text: A goal is not always meant to be reached, it often serves simply as something to aim at.
author: Bruce Lee

text: The stillness in stillness is not the real stillness; only when there is stillness in movement does the universal rhythm manifest.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Efficiency is anything that scores.
author: Bruce Lee

text: The key to immortality is first living a life worth remembering.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Don't fear failure.  Not failure, but low aim, is the crime. In great attempts it is glorious even to fail.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Knowing is not enough. We must apply. Willing is not enough. We must do.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Concentration is a form of exclusion, and where there is exclusion, there is a thinker who excludes.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Without frustration you will not discover that you might be able to do something on your own. We grow through conflict.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Obey the principles without being bound by them.
author: Bruce Lee

text: As an instructor, you must be able to distinguish between poor performance caused by lack of ability or aptitude on the part of the student and poor performance caused by lack of effort. You should treat the first with patience and the latter with firmness. You must never apply sarcasm and ridicule.
author: Bruce Lee

text: An instructor should exemplify the things he seeks to teach. It will be of great advantage if you yourself can do all you ask of your students and more.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Nothingness cannot be defined; the softest thing cannot be snapped.
author: Bruce Lee

text: The possession of anything begins in the mind.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Don't fear failureâ€¦in great attempts it is glorious even to fail.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Take what's useful, discard what is not.
author: Bruce Lee

text: A kung fu man lives without being dependant on the opinions of others, and a master, unlike the beginner, holds himself in reserve. He is quiet and unassuming, with no desire to show off.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Cease negative mental chattering. If you think a thing is impossible, you'll make it impossible. Pessimism blunts the tools you need to succeed.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Do not allow negative thoughts to enter your mind for they are the weeds that strange confidence.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Never waste energy on worries or negative thoughts, all problems are brought into existence -drop them.
author: Bruce Lee

text: With every adversity comes a blessing because a shock acts as a reminder to oneself that we must not get stale in routine.
author: Bruce Lee

text: When you feel pain, you know that you are still alive.
author: Bruce Lee

text: True observation begins when devoid of set patterns; freedom of expression occurs when one is beyond system.
author: Bruce Lee

text: The timeless moment. - The 'moment' has no yesterday or tomorrow. It is not the result of thought and therefore has no time.
author: Bruce Lee

text: The usefulness of a cup is its emptiness.
author: Bruce Lee

text: In order to taste my cup of water you must first empty your cup.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Empty your cup so that it may be filled; become devoid to gain totality.
author: Bruce Lee

text: A wise man can learn more from a foolish question than a fool can learn from a wise answer.
author: Bruce Lee

text: A good teacher protects his pupils from his own influence.
author: Bruce Lee

text: The reward is found in the work.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Training for strength and flexibility is a must. You must use it to support your techniques. Techniques alone are no good if you don't support them with strength and flexibility.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Defense is attack, attack is defense, each being the cause and result of the other.
author: Bruce Lee

text: The truth is outside of all fixed patterns.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Life is wide, limitless. There is no border, no frontier.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Do not deny the classical approach, simply as a reaction, or you will have created another pattern and trapped yourself there.
author: Bruce Lee

text: The more relaxed the muscles are, the more energy can flow through the body. Using muscular tensions to try to 'do' the punch or attempting to use brute force to knock someone over will only work to opposite effect.
author: Bruce Lee

text: The consciousness of self is the greatest hindrance to the proper execution of all physical action.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Are you going to let the obstacles in your life be stumbling blocks or stepping stones? Choose the positive. You are the master of your attitude.
author: Bruce Lee

text: In building a statue, a sculptor doesn't keep adding clay to his subject. Actually, he keeps chiseling away at the nonessentials until the truth of his creation is revealed without obstruction.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Evaluation by others is not a guide for me.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Humility forms the basis of honor, just as the low ground forms the foundation of a high elevation.
author: Bruce Lee

text: As long as we separate this oneness into two we won't achieve realization.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Let nature take its course and your tools will strike at the right moment.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Art calls for complete mastery of techniques, developed by reflection within the soul.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Open yourself and flow, my friend. Flow in the total openness of the living moment.
author: Bruce Lee

text: There are no limits. There are only plateaus, and you must not stay there, you must go beyond them.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Now I see that I will never find the light unless, like the candle, I am my own fuel, consuming myself.
author: Bruce Lee

text: ‎The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
author: Bruce Lee

text: If you love life, don’t waste time, for time is what life is made up of.
author: Bruce Lee

text: If you spend too much time thinking about a thing, you’ll never get it done.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Knowledge will give you power, but character respect.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Mistakes are always forgivable if one has the courage to admit them.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Ever since I was a child I have had this instinctive urge for expansion and growth. To me, the function and duty of a quality human being is the sincere and honest development of one’s potential.
author: Bruce Lee

text: I'm not in this world to live up to your expectations, and you are not in this world to live up to mine.
author: Bruce Lee

text: It is not a daily increase, but a daily decrease. Hack away the inessentials.
author: Bruce Lee

text: To understand combat, one must approach it in a very simple and direct manner.
author: Bruce Lee

text: If you always put limit on everything you do, physical or anything else. It will spread into your work and into your life, there are no limits. There are only plateaus, and you must not stay there, you must go beyond them.
author: Bruce Lee

text: The doubters said, man can not fly. The doers said, Maybe, but we'll try, and finally soared Into the morning glow while nonbelievers watched from below.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Maturation is the development from environmental support to self support.
author: Bruce Lee

text: Long-term consistency trumps short-term intensity.
author: Bruce Lee
